me.title: About Me
text: Nice to meet you, visitor. My name is Alan, a CS undergrad at {link|UBC|https://www.ubc.ca/}, a software developer with passion, a knowledge seeker and a lifelong learner.

site.title: About This Site
text: A simple, beautiful, and responsive website built with {link|Vue|https://vuejs.org/} and modern TypeScript. Designed with {link|Tailwind|https://tailwindcss.com/} and {link|Reka UI|https://reka-ui.com/}. Feel free to read my {link|resume|/about}, see my {link|skill set|/skills}, or checkout my {link|projects|/projects}. Explore other pages as well!
